title: Vecta Travels
description: Vecta Travels is a world class provider of traveling experience with concierge services, car hire, hotel accommodation, travel insurance, visa assistance and affordable flight tickets.

title: CopulaApp
description: An Android application that allows offline streaming and sharing of media on nearby Android devices by peering with them.

title: StoryartApp
description: An Android media editing application, to edit picture, apply filters, text with styling, create movie picture with songs, and more. And easily share as Instagram, WhatsApp or Facebook story. Storyart as over 20K downloads on Playstore.

title: Patelo Travels
description: Patelo Travels is a portal providing flight ticket, hotel accomdations, visa assistance and car hiring service.

title: Ochulo Travels
description: Ochulo Travels is a portal providing flight ticket, hotel accomdations, visa assistance and car hiring service.

title: AMARS Portal
description: Amars Portal is an electoral event monitoring system. It is used in monitoring pre and post electoral event in Osun State, Nigeria.
